title: China and Hong Kong, Space X Launch, Tech Policy
itunes:title: China and Hong Kong, Space X Launch, Tech Policy
description:
Guests: Josh Wingrove, Bloomberg White house reporter, Hagar Chemali, CEO of Greenwich Media Strategies, former Treasury spokesperson for Terrorism and Financial Intelligence and “Host of Oh My World on YouTube!”, Barbara Comstock, former Virginia Republican Congresswoman, Senior Advisor at Baker Donelson, Leroy Chiao, former NASA astronaut and International Space Station commander and Co-founder and CEO of OneOrbit, and State Department Spokesperson Morgan Ortagus. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
